columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the firewall

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a firewall uniquely

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the firewall

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the firewall resource

columns.name: firewall_policy_id
columns.description: The firewallPolicy associated with this azure firewall

columns.name: hub_private_ip_address
columns.description: Private IP Address associated with azure firewall

columns.name: hub_public_ip_address_count
columns.description: The number of Public IP addresses associated with azure firewall

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: Name of an Azure Firewall SKU

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: Tier of an Azure Firewall

columns.name: threat_intel_mode
columns.description: The operation mode for Threat Intelligence

columns.name: virtual_hub_id
columns.description: The virtualHub to which the firewall belongs

columns.name: additional_properties
columns.description: A collection of additional properties used to further config this azure firewall

columns.name: application_rule_collections
columns.description: A collection of application rule collections used by Azure Firewall

columns.name: availability_zones
columns.description: A collection of availability zones denoting where the resource needs to come from

columns.name: hub_public_ip_addresses
columns.description: A collection of Public IP addresses associated with azure firewall or IP addresses to be retained

columns.name: ip_configurations
columns.description: A collection of IP configuration of the Azure Firewall resource

columns.name: ip_groups
columns.description: A collection of IpGroups associated with AzureFirewall

columns.name: nat_rule_collections
columns.description: A collection of NAT rule collections used by Azure Firewall

columns.name: network_rule_collections
columns.description: A collection of network rule collections used by Azure Firewall

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion
